title: Ala Moana Center
seo_description: Visitors and locals flock to this indoor/outdoor shopping mall, home to over 290 shops and restaurants.
contents_1: Visitors and locals flock to this indoor/outdoor shopping mall, home to over 290 shops and restaurants.
description: Both visitors and locals alike flock to this indoor/outdoor shopping mall, home to over 290 shops and restaurants. Ala Moana Center is open every day, close to Waikiki, and easily accessible via the shuttle. Within walking distance are popular stores like Wal-Mart, Sam’s Club, and Ross.
